actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and development of lands for public park and recreation facilities located adjacent to water resources development projects under the control of the Department of the Army.

summary.text: Authorizes the Chief of Engineers, under the Secretary of the Army: (1) to construct and maintain park and recreational facilities at water resources development projects; (2) to acquire lands for such purposes; and (3) to construct such facilities on adjacent land held by local interests.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and development of lands for public park and recreation facilities located adjacent to water resources development projects under the control of the Department of the Army.
